creator: carnold@apache.org
text:
ULONG_PTR occurs in include/arch/win32/apr_arch_misc.h in SVN HEAD and APR 1.2.12, but does not 
appear in 1.2.11.  ULONG_PTR is defined in the post VC6 platform SDK's as a 64-bits on Win64 and 
32-bits on 32-bit Windows (http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa384255(VS.85).aspx).

This problem appeared way back in 2002 http://markmail.org/search/?
q=list%3Aorg.apache.apr.dev+ULONG_PTR

The ULONG_PTR was reintroduced in rev 592967.

The attached patch introduces a new typedef (apr_uintptr_t) that is an unsigned int the same size as 
void* and changes the use of ULONG_PTR to apr_uintptr_t.

creator: carnold@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 21449
Patch replaces use of ULONG_PTR with newly introduced apr_uintptr_t.

As much as I don't care for raw VC6 compatibility without updating the SDK
to account for VC bugs...

...this patch was entirely sensible, thanks!  Committed for 1.3.x
